eu.cassandra.sim.math.response
Class Pricing

java.lang.Object
  eu.cassandra.sim.math.response.Pricing

public class Pricing
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for implementing the pricing model. This can be easily adopted for more compicated pricing schemes.

Version:
0.9, Date: 29.07.2013
Author:
Antonios Chrysopoulos

Constructor Detail

Pricing

public Pricing(int start,
               int end,
               double previous,
               double current,
               java.lang.String type)
A constructor of a pricing where all of the input variables are known.

Parameters:
start - The incentive's start minute of the day
end - The incentive's end minute of the day
price - The monetary value of the pricing
type - The type of pricing policy (Penalty or Reward)
